ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance class: GML application schemas, Land Use
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines requirements associated with the application schema.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion. There is a general limitation in all assertions that extensions in additional application schemas are only supported, if the unqualified name of the feature type in the extension is the same as the name of the feature type in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Conformance class: 'GML aplication schemas, Land Use'

Pre-requisite conformance classes:
  • Conformance Class 'INSPIRE GML application schemas'
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: Basic test
TestCase.description: Verify that the spatial data set contains at least one Land Use feature.

TestAssertion.label: lu-gml.a.1: Land Use feature in dataset
TestAssertion.description:
Check that the set of features in the spatial data set is not empty.

Source: Abstract Test Case 'Basic test', INSPIRE Data Specification on Land Use, A.1.1, (A.6.1)
TestAssertion.expression: let $featuresFromAppSchema := $features[descendant-or-self::*:ExistingLandUseDataSet | descendant-or-self::*:ExistingLandUseGrid | descendant-or-self::*:SpatialPlan | descendant-or-self::*:SampledExistingLandUseDataSet] return (if ($featuresFromAppSchema) then 'PASSED' else 'FAILED', if (not($featuresFromAppSchema)) then local:addMessage('TR.noFeature', map { 'theme': 'Land Use' }) else ())
